title: Missing thread: "When is kerning limited."
content:
Once upon a time there was a thread entitled, “When is kerning limited.” Does anyone have an active link to this?

 [‹ Tippecanoe](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810000207/http:/typophile.com/node/19084 "Go to previous forum topic") [How are you doing that? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070810000207/http:/typophile.com/node/19296 "Go to next forum topic")

comments.content: FWIW: I’ve used the search bar, Google’s advance search, and Wayback.org
